item.title: The Tearful Truth: Exploring the Science of Why Onions Make You Cry
item.description: Chopping onions is a culinary task that often comes with an unwelcome side effect: tears. But have you ever wondered why these pungent bulbs have the power to make us cry? In this blog post, we dive into the fascinating science behind onion-induced tears and explore the chemical reactions that turn meal prep into a teary affair.
